title: Book Review: 'Clean Code' by Robert C. Martin
excerpt: An essential read for every developer. 'Clean Code' taught me the importance of writing readable and maintainable code.

title: Book Review: 'The Phoenix Project' by Gene Kim
excerpt: A great novel that combines IT and business. This book gave me new insights into DevOps culture and collaboration.

title: Book Review: 'The Pragmatic Programmer' by Andrew Hunt
excerpt: Packed with practical advice and tips for programmers of all levels. A must-have guide for professional growth.
